mutations.name: Legendary Archmage Evolution
mutations.description: Evolves the creature into an Archmage subclass with extraordinary control abilities
mutations.effectDescription: Grants mastery over arcane energies and the ability to cast multiple powerful spells simultaneously

mutations.name: Legendary Juggernaut Evolution
mutations.description: Evolves the creature into a Juggernaut subclass with extraordinary defensive capabilities
mutations.effectDescription: Creates an almost impenetrable defense and the ability to absorb and redirect incoming damage

mutations.name: Legendary Assassin Evolution
mutations.description: Evolves the creature into an Assassin subclass with extraordinary precision and lethality
mutations.effectDescription: Grants perfect precision strikes and the ability to find and exploit critical weaknesses

mutations.name: Legendary Chronomancer Evolution
mutations.description: Evolves the creature into a Chronomancer subclass with extraordinary temporal manipulation abilities
mutations.effectDescription: Grants limited control over time, allowing acceleration, deceleration, and brief pauses in local time flow
